content: @Parth Partani like the blog post, but please make sure your log is maintained daily (not weekly) -- it doesn't need to be as long as your post on the 16th just 1-3 sentences summarizing what code you wrote that day, any questions, what you learned, what you accomplished, etc
@Benjamin Landers awesome accomplishment today!

@Cezar Ditto .. no log posts yet?? Needs to be every day or we will think people didn't work and bad things eventually happen. Even on days you don't work, it's a good habit to post a quick message saying that.
@Peter Pronai you just might win a best log award :)
